name: Boo's Shroom Adventures
description:
Description

This is a game about the very curious little bat whom, in the dead of night, has decided to visit a nearby town. Under the strong influence of some shrooms, he discovers that all the humans within the town have vanished and now seeks to discover the truth behind this mysterious disappearance.

Along his journey he gathers clues in hopes to find some answer, but he is not the only thing wandering in this town.

The Team

As it stand, we are all currently students studying at The Open Window Institute in our 3rd or final year of studying.

   Game Designer & Developer

        Aubrey Greyling
